paper_abstract: The concept of batch verifying multiple RSA digital signatures is to find a method that multiple digital signatures can be verified simultaneously in only one exponential operation time. In this article, we pm posed a new batch verifying multiple RSA digital signatures scheme. The main contribution of the proposed scheme is that it can easily discover where the signature-verification fault is located without re-verifying all individual signatures separately.
paper_title: A BATCH VERIFYING AND DETECTING THE ILLEGAL SIGNATURES
